title: U.S. Ambassador To Liberia: Many Challenges Remain In Ebola Response
teaser: Melissa Block speaks with U.S. ambassador to Liberia Deborah Malac about the U.S. effort to combat Ebola in West Africa. Work has been slowed by difficult conditions and a shortage of trained workers.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
